hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated:"Allah's Messenger would recite during Al-Witr: "Glorify the Name of your Lord the Most High' and, 'Say: O you disbelievers!' and, 'Say: Allah is One,' in each Rak'ah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَا يُقْرَأُ بِهِ فِي الْوِتْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related [About] What Is Recited During Al-Witr
